description.raw:
This PR adds the "Completion" section to the PDF report including score. 

The score is a value between 0 and 1 (higher is better) and is calculated as follow:

* If you don't find the lost person your score is 0.
* The elapsed time weights 80% of the score. The elapsed time is normalized using the `maximum_allowed_time` for this world. This parameter is included in each world file and hand tuned.
* The number of wrong `FOUND` reports weights 20% of the score. If you don't send any incorrect reports, you'll get the maximum score in this block. The number of wrong reports is normalized given a parameter `maximum_wrong_reports` included in each world file and hand tuned. The default value is `20`.

How to test it:

Run a new simulation with logging enabled and follow [this tutorial](#!/osrf/swarm/wiki/Tutorial_14-Generate_reports) for generating the PDF report. You should see the new section in the report.
